H0.text: who enforces the charter of rights and freedoms. Parliament

H1.text: who enforces the charter of rights and freedoms. The Prime Minister

H2.text: who enforces the charter of rights and freedoms. The Canadian Human Rights Commission

H3.text: who enforces the charter of rights and freedoms. courts

A4.text: The rights are enforceable by the courts through section 24 of the Charter, which allows courts discretion to award remedies to those whose rights have been denied.
